data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Discuss how a person can gain credibility.
data.answer: I think anyone who has credibility must be those who are trustworthy and always keep a promise. There are many ways to gain credibility, such as being accountable and honest. To establish credibility, you must be responsible for your decisions and actions. Credibility is, in a way, more important than success. It means others look at you as a reliable resource and decision-maker. It allows those who rely on you to know they can count on you, trust you, do business with you, and align with you. （87 字）

options.content: Who is someone who has credibility in your eyes?
How can a person gain credibility?
Why is credibility important to an individual or company?
